title: Windows Live Messenger (MSN) Ad Removal (8.5.1288.816)
description:
Windows Live Messenger (MSN) Ad Removal (8.5.1288.816)

Exactly what it says.  It&#039;s a patched and recompiled DLL that omits the banner ads from said version of Messenger.  Written and tested myself, and it won&#039;t screw up anything else.

Simply close Messenger, ensure it&#039;s not running in the system tray, and extract this to the program&#039;s directory. (Example:  C:Program FilesWindows LiveMessenger)
